title: Carluccio's Gothic typeface ????
content:
Does anyone know what this Typeface is?  
(The Title on the packaging?)

[http://www.carluccios.com/products/product.asp?func=show&pg=20&id=195](http://web.archive.org/web/20121214014518/http:/www.carluccios.com/products/product.asp?func=show&pg=20&id=195 "http://www.carluccios.com/products/product.asp?func=show&pg=20&id=195")
author: NatureBoy

comments.content: Thanks, rather a shame though, their fonts are lovely but expensive. I love their Archer thin.

Out of interest, does anybody accept the cost of fonts as part and parcel of being a designer  
OR  
do you charge up the client for the cost of the font?

Steve,

[Avenir](http://web.archive.org/web/20121214014518/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/avenir/black/) might be a suitable, cheaper alternative for you.

Have a look at Proxima Nova (single styles are available) as an alternative for Gotham.  
 [http://www.ms-studio.com/FontSales/proximanova.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20121214014518/http:/www.ms-studio.com/FontSales/proximanova.html "http://www.ms-studio.com/FontSales/proximanova.html")  
Yes, i agree, Avenir could be an alternative also.
